topics.body:
Back to Fallout 4

You can actually customize your weapons like turning your LASER pistol into a rifle. Also, you can mix and match pieces of power armor like the shoulder part of a T-45d with leg parts from T-51b.

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5587971363687213fc000f6f#post_5587971363687213fc000f6f
[bq="HJSDGCE"]"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558794ff6368723652000a98#post_558794ff6368723652000a98
Are SJWs saying that I'm not allowed to scour the wastelands as a man in a fabulous dress?
Fuck that, they don't know the beautiful feeling of wearing one.[/bq]
No; they're angry that you aren't forced to play as only a woman in the game and that there are any male characters in the games.

You know how every couple months they get even crazier?

Pre-E3, "I'm fighting against problematic violence against women in video games!"
Post-E3:
!http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/978/722/251.jpg!

Tl:dr; nobody's listening to feminists/sjw anymore cause they're trying to remove all men from video games and are trying to ban *all* violence in video games.
